global.text: This is a living project. We are actively developing these frameworks and building our organization. You may encounter broken links or inconsistencies as we refine our work. Thank you for your understanding.

frameworks.text: Note from the Founder: The core concepts and structure of this framework are in place, but it is currently undergoing a detailed revision to improve clarity, consistency, and alignment with our project's strategy. We appreciate your patience, and your feedback during this audit is invaluable.

ui.tapAgainToExplore: Tap again to explore this framework
ui.clickOnTheNode: Click on the node to visit the framework

follow.title: Stay Connected
follow.description: Follow our updates through your preferred method. No email required.

rss.title: RSS Feed
rss.description: Universal feed reader support. Works with any RSS reader.

social.title: Social Media
social.description: Follow us on social platforms for updates and discussions.

bookmark.title: Bookmark This Page
bookmark.description: Add this blog to your bookmarks and check back regularly.

global.note: Built for global accessibility - no email collection, no tracking, open for everyone.
